split_sheet.name: Split Sheet Agreement
split_sheet.content:
SONG TITLE: _________________________
DATE: _____________

### Contributors
Writer 1: _________________________ Contribution %: _____%
Writer 2: _________________________ Contribution %: _____%
Producer: _________________________ Contribution %: _____%

### Ownership
Each party owns their stated percentage of the composition and agrees to split all revenue accordingly.

production.name: Basic Production Agreement
production.content:
PRODUCER: LUCTHELEO
ARTIST: _________________________
PROJECT: _________________________
DATE: _____________

### Services
Producer agrees to provide creative development and production services for the specified project.

### Ownership
- Artist retains ownership of master recording
- Producer retains ownership of instrumental/beat composition

### Credit
Producer credit: "Produced by LUCTHELEO"

confidentiality.name: Confidentiality Agreement
confidentiality.content:
REVERIE | RVR Creative Development Agreement

### Session Confidentiality
LUCTHELEO agrees to maintain complete confidentiality regarding all information shared during creative development sessions.

### Creative Work Ownership
All creative works developed during sessions remain the intellectual property of the client unless otherwise specified.

content_release.name: Content Release Authorization
content_release.content:
REVERIE | RVR Content Release Authorization

### Release Authorization
I authorize the release of the described content according to the terms specified in this form.

### Credit and Attribution
Producer Credit: LUCTHELEO

non_exclusive_license.name: Non-Exclusive Beat License
non_exclusive_license.content:
LICENSOR: LUCTHELEO
LICENSEE: _________________________
BEAT TITLE: _________________________

### License Terms
- Non-exclusive license to use instrumental composition
- Credit required: 'Produced by LUCTHELEO'

exclusive_license.name: Exclusive Beat License
exclusive_license.content:
LICENSOR: LUCTHELEO
LICENSEE: _________________________
BEAT TITLE: _________________________

### Exclusive Rights
Licensee receives exclusive rights to instrumental composition including unlimited commercial use.

buyout.name: Basic Buyout Agreement
buyout.content:
SELLER: LUCTHELEO
BUYER: _________________________
ASSET: _________________________

### Rights Transferred
Seller transfers all rights, title, and interest in the specified asset to Buyer.

basic_license.name: Basic Non-Exclusive License
basic_license.content:
### 1. Basic Non-Exclusive License Agreement
**Fee:** $50 USD
**Usage Limit:** 50,000 streams/sales
**Deliverables:** MP3 file only

**What You Get:**
- Worldwide rights to use the beat for one song.
- Up to 50,000 total streams/sales across all platforms
- One official music video allowed
- Distribution rights (digital only, up to 500 physical copies)

standard_license.name: Standard Non-Exclusive License
standard_license.content:
### 2. Standard Non-Exclusive License Agreement
**Fee:** $100 USD
**Usage Limit:** 100,000 streams/sales
**Deliverables:** MP3 + WAV files

**What You Get:**
- Worldwide rights to use the beat for one song.
- Up to 100,000 total streams/sales across all platforms
- One official music video allowed
- Distribution rights (digital and up to 1,000 physical copies)

**What I Keep:**
- 50% of publishing rights

premium_license.name: Premium Non-Exclusive License
premium_license.content:
### 3. Premium Non-Exclusive License Agreement
**Fee:** $175 USD
**Usage:** Unlimited streams/sales
**Deliverables:** MP3 + WAV + Stems

**What You Get:**
- Worldwide rights to use the beat for one song.
- Unlimited streams, sales, and performances
- Multiple music videos allowed
- Distribution rights (digital and physical)
- Basic sync rights for independent projects

coaching.name: Creative Development Coaching
coaching.content:
### Creative Development Coaching
**Individual Sessions:** $75 per hour
**Package Deal:** $500 for 8 hours (save $100)

**What's Covered:**
- Song structure and arrangement fundamentals
- Music theory basics for practical application
- Recording techniques and studio workflow
- Creative development and artistic direction
- Industry knowledge and business basics

framework.HTML: Foundation: Authentic creative message and purpose. The 'Why'. The face only you know.
framework.CSS: Presentation: Visual identity and aesthetic choices. The 'Image'. The face your loved ones know.
framework.JS: Function: Market operation and action. The 'Marketing'. The face the world sees.
